description:
Part of Matt Barnett's YOU CAN! series of Self hypnosis Programs. This 'Get rid of the Fear of Flying' program of Hypnosis or Self Hypnosis is a system of relaxation and directed thought and attention that when in a state of Hypnosis allows you to communicate with the unconscious mind so that you can

  • Change your behaviour at the unconscious level and take control of your Fear of Flying
  • Take control of your thinking - so that you can take control of your results
  • Finally get rid of that fear of flying that as been holding you back with Hypnosis
  • Feel confident when travelling by using self hypnosis
  • See yourself as a confident and positive flyer with control of your thinking
  • Use Hypnosis begin to feel calm and balanced in your life
  • Learn how to easily use Hypnosis to go into a relaxed and empowered state.

This course takes under 2 hours to complete and the result may very well help you to change your life forever.
title: â–º You Can! Defeat the Fear of Flying  with Hypnosis and NLP
